subproject.title: Cycle Electoral 2010 CE

subproject.description: This project aims to reduce the risk of violence induced by the upcoming electoral process in Burundi and to build a foundation for conflict prevention and recovery programming in Burundi. At the national level, the project will seek to assist the Independent Electoral Commission (CENI) as well as its provincial (CEPI) and communal (CECI) structures to address issues related to electoral disputes, and will strengthen the media’s peaceful and responsible coverage before, during and after the series of 5 communal, local, legislative, senatorial and presidential elections
subproject.title: Peaceful Elections in Burundi

subproject.description: To contribute to peaceful and violence-free elections in BDI.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Emergency Support to Elections
